text: Amazon was founded in 1994 by Jeff Bezos in Seattle, Washington. The company started as an online bookstore and later expanded into cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and digital streaming services. Jeff Bezos served as the CEO of Amazon until 2021, after which Andy Jassy became the CEO. Amazon produces popular devices such as Kindle, Echo, and Fire TV. The company operates Amazon Web Services, which is a leading cloud computing platform. Amazon competes with companies like Microsoft, Google, and Alibaba in various technology markets. In 2020, Amazon recorded a revenue of over 386 billion dollars. The headquarters of Amazon is located in Seattle.
